entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
